Polynomial Static Load¶

Mechanical ODE¶

\[\frac{ \mathrm{d} \omega_{me} } { \mathrm{d} t } = \frac{ T - T_L(\omega_{me})}{J_{total}}\]

Polynomial Load Equation¶

\[\begin{split}T_L(\omega_{me})=\mathrm{sign}(\omega_{me})(c \omega^2_{me} + b \vert\omega_{me}\vert + a)\\\end{split}\]

Class Description¶

class gym_electric_motor.physical_systems.mechanical_loads.PolynomialStaticLoad(load_parameter=(), **__)[source]¶

Mechanical system that models the Mechanical-ODE based on a static polynomial load torque.

Parameter dictionary entries:
a: Constant Load Torque coefficient (for modeling static friction)
b: Linear Load Torque coefficient (for modeling sliding friction)
c: Quadratic Load Torque coefficient (for modeling air resistances)
j_load: Moment of inertia of the mechanical system.
Parameters:load_parameter (dict(float)) – Parameter dictionary.
get_state_space(omega_range)¶
Parameters:omega_range (Tuple(int,int)) – Lower and upper values the motor can generate for omega normalized to (-1, 1)
Returns:Lowest and highest possible values for all states normalized to (-1, 1)
Return type:Tuple(dict,dict)
j_total¶

**Returns* – float* – Total moment of inertia affecting the motor shaft.

limits¶

**Returns* – dict(float)* – Mapping of the motor states to their limit values.

load_parameter¶

**Returns* – dict(float)* – Parameter dictionary of the load.

mechanical_ode(t, mechanical_state, torque)[source]¶

Calculation of the derivatives of the mechanical-ODE for each of the mechanical states.

Parameters:
  • t (float) – Current time of the system.
  • mechanical_state (ndarray(float)) – Current state of the mechanical system.
  • torque (float) – Generated input torque by the electrical motor.
Returns:

Derivatives of the mechanical state for the given input torque.
Return type:

ndarray(float)
nominal_values¶

**Returns* – dict(float)* – Mapping of the motor states to their nominal values

reset(*_, **__)¶

Reset the motors mechanical-ODE to an initial state (default: all zeros).

Returns:Initial state of the mechanical-ODE.
Return type:ndarray(float)
set_j_rotor(j_rotor)¶
Parameters:j_rotor (float) – The moment of inertia of the rotor shaft of the motor.
state_names¶

**Returns* – list(str)* – Names of the states in the mechanical-ODE.
